name: bengali-numbers-game
description: Bengali Multiplication Game with Google TTS integration

scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-assets
scripts.copy-assets: mkdir -p dist/css && cp src/css/*.css dist/css/ && cp src/index.html dist/
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run serve
scripts.deploy-edge-function: cd src/supabase && npx supabase functions deploy tts --project-ref YOUR_PROJECT_REF
